title: Meta threatens to block news in California over journalism bill
description: Meta is threatening to block users from sharing news articles on its social media networks in protest of a bill that aims to force tech companies to pay publishers for content.

title: Federal regulators fine Amazon $25 million over child privacy issues
description: The FTC says Amazon's voice assistant Alexa violated child privacy rules

title: Amazon workers walk out amid layoffs, citing concerns for climate
description: Frustrated over return to office mandates and worried about climate change amid economic anxiety and widespread layoffs, Amazon workers are staging a walkout.

title: Doctors don’t talk about postpartum loneliness. But TikTok does.
description: On TikTok, users are discussing the mental health risks of motherhood more candidly than ever, as the specter of loneliness hangs over parents and child-free people alike.

title: Where are all those food delivery fees going? We tested three apps to find out.
description: DoorDash, Grubhub and Uber Eats may be convenient, but whether they’re a winning proposition for anybody can swing on a few dollars.
